content.description: Sit start a couple of feet to the right of Balancing Act in two crimpy crack slots. Work left into a crack and then up onto some good edges to top out.
content.location: Sit starts a couple of feet to the right of Balancing Act and veers left.

content.description: Sit start further around the backside of Balance Rock and several more feet to the right of Unbalancing Act with your left hand in a horrible sideways crack crimp and your right hand in a sloping crack slot. Make sure your right foot is far out the right on good feet before making a hard move up and left to a bad crimpy side pull. Shift your feet and push off of the side pull in gaston-like fashion to reach a bad but useable hold on the slab. Top out on the slab.
content.location: Sit starts several feet to the right of Unbalancing Act on the backside of Balance Rock.

content.description: Sit start a couple of feet to the right of Acrophysica in the middle of the front face of Balance Rock in good crack edges. Work straight up and then right on a good sloper edge leaning right. Top out before the boulder drops off to the right.
content.location: Sit starts in the middle of the front face of Balance Rock and then traverse right to top out just before the boulder drops off to the right.

content.description: Sit start to the right of One-Armed Artistry on a good edge. Slap straight up to a sloper edge just below the slab and then use good holds to top out on the slab.
content.location: Sit starts directly to the right of One-Armed Artistry on the backside of Balance Rock. Tops out straight up from the start.

content.description: Sit start in a good crack slot to the right of the small overhand on Balance Rock. Work left into the crack and then slap out left into another. Get awkward high feet to top out.
content.location: Sit starts in a good crack slot around the small overhang to the right. Works left to top out.

content.description: Sit start as for Acrophysica and work straight up from the start on good holds.
content.location: Sit start as for Acrophysica on the far left-hand side of the front face. Work straight up on good holds.

content.description: Sit start with your left hand around the arete and your right hand on a good edge on the far left side of the front of Balance Rock (the front faces downhill towards Debris Field Right and The Mothership). Traverse right in good slopey and juggy holds and top out at the highest point of the boulder.
content.location: Sit starts on the left-hand side of the front face of Balance Rock and traverse right to top out.

content.description: A beautiful medium-sized boulder to the left of a wet area up and to the right of The Mothership.
